name: wetty
description: Wetty is a self-hosted web-based terminal that exposes SSH access through the browser. It replaces traditional terminal apps with a responsive web UI, letting users reach shell sessions securely from anywhere without extra client software.

features.title: Browser
features.description: Access SSH sessions directly from any web browser without installing terminal software

features.title: Ssh Connectivity
features.description: Connect to remote servers using standard SSH protocol with key or password authentication

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Use the terminal on desktop, tablet, or mobile devices with touch-friendly controls

features.title: Copy
features.description: Transfer commands and output between your local system and the terminal easily

features.title: Session Persistence
features.description: Maintain terminal sessions even when closing the browser tab with reconnection support

features.title: Multiple Sessions
features.description: Open multiple terminal tabs or windows to work on different servers simultaneously

features.title: Theme Customization
features.description: Adjust font size, color schemes, and terminal themes for comfortable viewing

features.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
features.description: Use familiar terminal keyboard shortcuts for efficient command-line navigation
